National Priority List/Superfund Sites

npls.Rd

A spatial points data frame containing National Priority List (otherwise known as Superfund) sites in the state of Georgia or within 5 km of the state boundary. Data are projected in NAD 1983 Georgia Statewide Lambert. Data were queried from the EPA Envirofacts API on August 26, 2025.

Usage

npls

Format

npls

A data frame with 17 rows and 13 columns:

NAME

Name of Superfund site

EPA_ID

A unique 12-digit identification number assigned by the Superfund Enterprise Management System

SITE_ID

Unique identifier for site for Superfunds with multiple sites

STREET

Street address of Superfund location

ADDR_C

Additional address information for Superfund location, if any

CITY

City/town/village/municipality of Superfund location or nearest place name if site is not within a formal jurisdiction.

COUNTY

County of Superfund location

STATE

State of Superfund location

ZIP

5-digit zip code of Superfund location

DATE

Date that information was queried from the EPA Envirofacts API

geometry

geometry

...

Source

https://enviro.epa.gov/

See also

The script used to create the npls dataset: https://github.com/cdcent/hazprox/blob/main/data-raw/npls.R
